title: DEPNotify Onboarder Settings
description: Configuration for the DEPNotify Onboarder deployment script.

testingMode.title: Testing Mode
testingMode.description: Testing flag will enable the following things to change: (1) Auto removal of BOM files to reduce errors (2) Sleep commands instead of policies or other changes being called (3) Quit Key set to command+control+x

policies.title: Policies
policies.description: The policy array must be formatted "Progress Bar Text,customTrigger". These will be run in order as they appear below.

eventTriggerType.title: Jamf Pro Event Trigger Type
eventTriggerType.description: Policies can be called be either a custom trigger or by policy id. Select either event, to call the policy by the custom trigger, or id to call the policy by id.

inventoryCustomTrigger.title: Inventory Custom Trigger
inventoryCustomTrigger.description: The name of a policy to allow inventory updates on.

noSleep.title: No Sleep (caffeinate)
noSleep.description: Flag script to keep the computer from sleeping. BE VERY CAREFUL WITH THIS FLAG! This flag could expose your data to risk by leaving an unlocked computer wide open. Only recommended if you are using fullscreen mode and have a logout taking place at the end of configuration (like for FileVault). Some folks may use this in workflows where IT staff are the primary people setting up the device. The device will be allowed to sleep again once the DEPNotify app is quit as caffeinate is looking at DEPNotify's process ID.

pathToPlistFile.title: Results Plist (DEPNotify)
pathToPlistFile.description: Path to plist where Registration and EULA results are recorded.

fullscreen.title: Fullscreen
fullscreen.description: Flag the app to open fullscreen or as a window

bannerImagePath.title: Banner Image Path
bannerImagePath.description: Banner image can be 600px wide by 100px high. Images will be scaled to fit. If this variable is left blank, the generic image will appear. If using custom Self Service branding, please see the Customized Self Service Branding settings.

orgName.title: Organization Name
orgName.description: Update the variable below replacing "Organization" with the actual name of your organization. Example: "ACME Corp Inc."

bannerTitle.title: Banner Title
bannerTitle.description: Main heading that will be displayed under the image. If this variable is left blank, the generic banner will appear.

supportContactDetails.title: Support Contact Details
supportContactDetails.description: Update the variable below replacing "email helpdesk@company.com" with the actual plaintext instructions for your organization. Example: "call 555-1212" or "email helpdesk@company.com"

mainText.title: Main Text
mainText.description: Paragraph text that will display under the main heading. For a new line, use '\n' If this variable is left blank, the generic message will appear.
mainText.default: We want you to have a few applications and settings configured before you get started with your new Mac. This process should take 10 to 20 minutes to complete. \n \n If you need additional software or help, please visit the Self Service app in your Applications folder or on your Dock.

installStartStatus.title: Install Start Status Message
installStartStatus.description: Initial Start Status text that shows as things are firing up

installCompleteText.title: Install Complete Status Message
installCompleteText.description: Text that will display in the progress bar when configuration completes

completeMethodDropdownAlert.title: Use Complete Method Dropdown Alert
completeMethodDropdownAlert.description: Complete messaging to the end user can ether be a button at the bottom of the app with a modification to the main window text or a dropdown alert box. Default value set to false and will use buttons instead of dropdown messages.

completeAlertText.title: Install Complete Alert Text
completeAlertText.description: Text that will display inside the alert once policies have finished when using dropdown alert box.
completeAlertText.default: Your Mac is now finished with initial setup and configuration. Press Quit to get started!

completeMainText.title: Install Complete Status Message
completeMainText.description: Main text that will display inside the alert once policies have finished when not using dropdown alert box.
completeMainText.default: Your Mac is now finished with initial setup and configuration.

completeButtonText.title: Install Complete Status Message
completeButtonText.description: Button text that will display inside the alert once policies have finished when not using dropdown alert box.

statusTextAlignment.title: Status Text Alignment (DEPNotify)
statusTextAlignment.description: The status text under the progress bar can be configured to be left, right, or center.

selfDestruct.title: Self Destruct
selfDestruct.description: Remove the DEPNotifyOnboarder script, Launch Daemon, and DEPNotify when onboarding is complete.

helpBubble.title: Help Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
helpBubble.description: The help button will appear if title is populated. This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: This tool is designed to help with new employee onboarding. If you have issues, please give us a call at (877) 590-2511.

selfServiceCustomBranding.title: Self Service - Custom Branding
selfServiceCustomBranding.description: Flag for using the custom branding icon from Self Service and Jamf Pro. This will override the banner image specified above. If you have changed the name of Self Service, make sure to modify the Self Service name below. Please note, custom branding is downloaded from Jamf Pro after Self Service has opened at least one time. The script is designed to wait until the files have been downloaded. This could take a few minutes depending on server and network resources.

selfServiceAppName.title: Self Service - App Name
selfServiceAppName.description: If using a name other than Self Service with Custom branding. Keep .app on the end.

selfServiceCustomWait.title: Self Service - Custom Wait (Seconds)
selfServiceCustomWait.description: Number of seconds to wait for the Self Service custon icon.

launchSelfService.title: Self Service - Launch on Completion (Experimental)
launchSelfService.description: Launch Self Service after DEPNotify exits.

completeCustomTrigger.title: Completion Custom Trigger
completeCustomTrigger.description: Run policies with a custom trigger after user presses completion button. This may be used to launch Self Service.

errorBannerTitle.title: Error - Banner Title
errorBannerTitle.description: Main heading that will be displayed under the image

errorMainText.title: Error - Main Text
errorMainText.description: Paragraph text that will display under the main heading. For a new line, use "\n" If this variable is left blank, the generic message will appear.
errorMainText.default:
We are sorry that you are experiencing this inconvenience with your new Mac. However, we have the nerds to get you back up and running in no time! 
 
 Please contact IT right away and we will take a look at your computer ASAP.

errorStatus.title: Error - Status Message
errorStatus.description: Error status message that is displayed under the progress bar

FVRestartEnabled.title: FileVault - Restart Enabled
FVRestartEnabled.description: Enable restart for deferred FileVault enablement

FVAlertText.title: FileVault - Alert Text
FVAlertText.default: Your Mac must logout to start the encryption process. You will be asked to enter your password and click OK or Continue a few times. Your Mac will be usable while encryption takes place.

FVCompleteMainText.title: FileVault - Complete Main Text
FVCompleteMainText.description: Main Text if not using dropdown alert box
FVCompleteMainText.default: Your Mac must logout to start the encryption process. You will be asked to enter your password and click OK or Continue a few times. Your Mac will be usable while encryption takes place.

FVCompleteButtonText.title: FileVault - Complete Button Text
FVCompleteButtonText.description: Button Text if not using dropdown alert box

EULAStatus.title: EULA - Status Message
EULAStatus.default: Waiting on completion of EULA acceptance

EULAButton.title: EULA - Button
EULAButton.description: The button text on the main screen used to display the EULA before continuing

EULASubTitle.title: EULA - Main Subtitle (DEPNotify)
EULASubTitle.default: Please agree to the following terms and conditions to start configuration of this Mac

pathToEULA.title: EULA - Path to EULA (DEPNotify)
pathToEULA.description: Path to the EULA file you would like the user to read and agree to. It is best to package this up with Composer or another tool and deliver it to a shared area like /Users/Shared/ or use the "deployTextFile1Path" option.

registrationEnabled.title: Registration - Enabled
registrationEnabled.description: Enable presenting a customizable registration form

registrationTitle.title: Registration - Title
registrationTitle.description: Registration window title. Suggested text: "Register Mac at Organization"

registrationStatus.title: Registration - Status Message
registrationStatus.default: Waiting on completion of computer registration

registrationButton.title: Registration - Button Label
registrationButton.description: Registration window submit or finish button text

registrationBeginWord.title: Registration - Begin Word
registrationBeginWord.description: The text and pick list sections below will write the following lines out for end users. Use the variables below to configure what the sentence says. Example: Setting Computer Name to macBook0132

registrationMiddleWord.title: Registration - Middle Word
registrationMiddleWord.description: The text and pick list sections below will write the following lines out for end users. Use the variables below to configure what the sentence says. Example: Setting Computer Name to macBook0132

textField1Bubble.title: Text Field 1 - Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
textField1Bubble.description: This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: This field is sets the name of your new Mac to what is in the Computer Name box. This is important for inventory purposes.

textField1CustomTrigger.title: Text Field 1 - Custom Trigger
textField1CustomTrigger.description: A custom trigger to call for field 1 when registration is complete. The value may be deleted from the DEPNotify plist to force re-entry.

textField2Bubble.title: Text Field 2 - Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
textField2Bubble.description: This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: This field is used to give an updated asset tag to our asset management system. If you do not know your asset tag number, please skip this field.

textField2CustomTrigger.title: Text Field 2 - Custom Trigger
textField2CustomTrigger.description: A custom trigger to call for field 2 when registration is complete. The value may be deleted from the DEPNotify plist to force re-entry.

popupMenu1Bubble.title: Popup Field 1 - Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
popupMenu1Bubble.description: This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: Please choose the appropriate building for where you normally work. This is important for inventory purposes.

popupButton1CustomTrigger.title: Popup Field 1 - Custom Trigger
popupButton1CustomTrigger.description: A custom trigger to call for popup action and validation when registration is complete. The value may be deleted from the DEPNotify plist to force re-entry.

popupMenu2Bubble.title: Popup Field 2 - Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
popupMenu2Bubble.description: This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: Please choose the appropriate department for where you normally work. This is important for inventory purposes.

popupButton2CustomTrigger.title: Popup Field 2 - Custom Trigger
popupButton2CustomTrigger.description: A custom trigger to call for popup action and validation when registration is complete. The value may be deleted from the DEPNotify plist to force re-entry.

popupMenu3Bubble.title: Popup Field 3 - Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
popupMenu3Bubble.description: This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: This dropdown is currently not in use.

popupButton3CustomTrigger.title: Popup Field 3 - Custom Trigger
popupButton3CustomTrigger.description: A custom trigger to call for popup action and validation when registration is complete. The value may be deleted from the DEPNotify plist to force re-entry.

popupMenu4Bubble.title: Popup Field 4 - Bubble Text (DEPNotify)
popupMenu4Bubble.description: This array should have two lines for title and content.
default: This dropdown is currently not in use.

popupButton4CustomTrigger.title: Popup Field 4 - Custom Trigger
popupButton4CustomTrigger.description: A custom trigger to call for popup action and validation when registration is complete. The value may be deleted from the DEPNotify plist to force re-entry.
